analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/2/0xb547cc51ce58293e6945ba08d664ce051563d9ac.sol#598) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/2/0xb547cc51ce58293e6945ba08d664ce051563d9ac.sol#691-724)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/2/0xb547cc51ce58293e6945ba08d664ce051563d9ac.sol#806-825)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0xb547cc51ce58293e6945ba08d664ce051563d9ac.sol#900-917)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0xb547cc51ce58293e6945ba08d664ce051563d9ac.sol#923-934)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/2/0xb547cc51ce58293e6945ba08d664ce051563d9ac.sol#1001-1005) is declared view but contains assembly code

BloomTokenSale.syncPresaleWeiRaised (/unique_chucks/2/0xb547cc51ce58293e6945ba08d664ce051563d9ac.sol#468-472) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(weiRaised == 0)

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_chucks/2/0xb547cc51ce58293e6945ba08d664ce051563d9ac.sol#738-756):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount)) (/unique_chucks/2/0xb547cc51ce58293e6945ba08d664ce051563d9ac.sol#753-754)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/2/0xb547cc51ce58293e6945ba08d664ce051563d9ac.sol#755)

BloomTokenSale.finalization (/unique_chucks/2/0xb547cc51ce58293e6945ba08d664ce051563d9ac.sol#526-528) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(address(this),wallet,token.balanceOf(address(this))) (/unique_chucks/2/0xb547cc51ce58293e6945ba08d664ce051563d9ac.sol#526-527)

BloomTokenSale.allocateSupply (/unique_chucks/2/0xb547cc51ce58293e6945ba08d664ce051563d9ac.sol#350-354) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.generateTokens(address(this),CONTROLLER_ALLOCATION) (/unique_chucks/2/0xb547cc51ce58293e6945ba08d664ce051563d9ac.sol#352-353)
	-token.generateTokens(wallet,WALLET_ALLOCATION) (/unique_chucks/2/0xb547cc51ce58293e6945ba08d664ce051563d9ac.sol#354)

BloomTokenSale.transferUnallocatedAdvisorTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0xb547cc51ce58293e6945ba08d664ce051563d9ac.sol#474-481) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(address(this),wallet,_unallocatedTokens) (/unique_chucks/2/0xb547cc51ce58293e6945ba08d664ce051563d9ac.sol#480-481)

BloomTokenSale.allocateTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0xb547cc51ce58293e6945ba08d664ce051563d9ac.sol#494-497) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(address(this),_beneficiary,tokensFor(_weiAmount)) (/unique_chucks/2/0xb547cc51ce58293e6945ba08d664ce051563d9ac.sol#496-497)

MiniMeToken.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0xb547cc51ce58293e6945ba08d664ce051563d9ac.sol#1033-1039) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_chucks/2/0xb547cc51ce58293e6945ba08d664ce051563d9ac.sol#1038)

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/2/0xb547cc51ce58293e6945ba08d664ce051563d9ac.sol#963) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_chucks/2/0xb547cc51ce58293e6945ba08d664ce051563d9ac.sol#1009-1011)

Reentrancy in BloomTokenSale.finishPresale (/unique_chucks/2/0xb547cc51ce58293e6945ba08d664ce051563d9ac.sol#398-405):
	External calls:
	- transferUnallocatedAdvisorTokens() (/unique_chucks/2/0xb547cc51ce58293e6945ba08d664ce051563d9ac.sol#400-401)
	- updateRateBasedOnFundsAndSupply() (/unique_chucks/2/0xb547cc51ce58293e6945ba08d664ce051563d9ac.sol#401-404)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- configured (/unique_chucks/2/0xb547cc51ce58293e6945ba08d664ce051563d9ac.sol#404)
	- rate (/unique_chucks/2/0xb547cc51ce58293e6945ba08d664ce051563d9ac.sol#401-404)

Reentrancy in BloomTokenSale.updateRateBasedOnFundsAndSupply (/unique_chucks/2/0xb547cc51ce58293e6945ba08d664ce051563d9ac.sol#483-489):
	External calls:
	- _tokensForSale = token.balanceOf(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/2/0xb547cc51ce58293e6945ba08d664ce051563d9ac.sol#484-487)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- rate (/unique_chucks/2/0xb547cc51ce58293e6945ba08d664ce051563d9ac.sol#487-488)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/2/0xb547cc51ce58293e6945ba08d664ce051563d9ac.sol#1001-1005)
	- /unique_chucks/2/0xb547cc51ce58293e6945ba08d664ce051563d9ac.sol#1003-1005
